TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_hawngu’_Utux, title = hawngu’_Utux, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/hawngu’_Utux} }

S.FORM: hawngu' Utux yalaw gi nanak hawngu Utux qaniy nanak qu tuqiy awsa' kya 'tuxan ru. hawngu' Utux sun Tayal hya' ga mutuw ktan sa kayal na bun wagi' sa gnagap cikay lngut kayal ka blaq balay ktan na hawngu', yalaw gi ini' baqiy tmring na qba' ru, nanu' yasa qu sun naha' maha hawngu' na Utux kya la.

hawngo' Utox yalaw gi nanak hawngo Utox qaniy nanak qo toqiy awsa' kya 'toxan ro. hawngo' Utox son Tayal hya' ga motow ktan sa kayal na bon wagi' sa gnagap cikay lngot kayal ka blaq balay ktan na hawngo', yalaw gi ini' baqiy tmring na qba' ro, nano' yasa qo son naha' maha hawngo' na Utox kya la.
